antharajala naridweshaya[sanskaranaya] antharajalaya magin sthri wirodhi mathawada pathuruwa harima adawanawita bohotita siduwe.wisheshayen me thathwaya samaja samaja madhyathula bahulabawa samaja widagnyayan prakashakarayi.[26][27] 2016 wasaredi tank demon sidukala paryeshanayata anuwa mese twitar nam samaja jala web adawiya haraha sthri wirodhi balapam sidukara aththe 50% ma kanthawan wisinma bawayi.[28]

ada dina palathe manthrithuma hamuwannata aawe ohuta kiya kese ho sewa anuyukthayak sakas karaganna atiyeni. Àùethakota oya me puhunuwata badawagaththe kage list eken da?.. Àù mage manolokaya bindimin manthrithuma nawatha prashna kaleya. Àùnaha mama aawe list ekakin neweyi anthimata thiyapu intawiw ekenÀù Àùee kiyanne pasweni kandayame..? Àù Àùow manthrithama.. Àù ewitama eliyata giya lekam thuma nawatha karyalaya thulata pamina manthrithama desata nami kumakdo kanata kondura ohuge asunin idagaththya. Àùee kiyanne oyage thaththa samupakare wadakale ?Àù Àùow manthrithamaÀù Àùara kakulata wedi wadune?Àù Àù ow manthrithumaÀù lekam thuma kutu kutu gawe kumakdayi watahune danya ohu karyalayen pitathatagos apage game kisiwekutata ho kathakara ma gana thorathuru soyagena atha.

janadhipathi rajapaksha mathithuma shri lankawe sanwardhana wadasatahan ganath wathman jathika samagi sandhana kriyadamaya ganath wisthara kaleya.abhyantharikawa awathanwuwan udesa uthuru nagenahira depalathe niwasa eekaka 43,000k idikirime indiya wyapruthiya gana sandahan kala mukharji janadhipathithuma, 2013 wasare nawa niwasa 10,000k pamana idikala bawa pawasiya.me wasare thawath niwasa 16,000k thana nima kirimata salasum kara athayi ki indiya janadhipathithuma 2015 wasara athulatha wyapruthiya sampurna kerena bawa sandahan kaleya.thama indiyawe widesha amathiwarayawa sitiyadi 2009 wasare shri lankawe kala charikawa mukharji janadhipathithuma wisin sihipathkaranu labiya.indiyawe nawa agramathya narendra modi mathithumage diwurum dime uthsawayata sahabhagi wima pinisa pereda (26) nawa dilli nuwarata giya rajapaksha mathithuma eeye (27) ude nawa agramathyathuma samanga dwiparshwika sakachchawala niratha wiya.widesha amathya mahacharya ji.el. piris, pashu sampath ha gramiya praja sanwardhana amathya aarumugam thondaman, widesha amathyanshaye adhikshana manthri sajin da was gunawardhana yana mahathwaru, yapanaya maha nagara sabhawe nagaradhipathini yogeshwari sathgunaraja mahathmiya, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahatha,widesha amathyanshaye lekam shenuka senewirathna mahathmiya saha indiyawe shri lanka maha komasaris prasad kariyawasam mahatha da sakachchawata sahabhagi wi sitiyaha..
ehi di jala awashoshana rekha warnawaliye daknata labuna.
